title: of the Social Welfare (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2023 (No. 37 of 2023)
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Social Welfare (Miscellaneous
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Social Welfare (Miscellaneous 

Provisions) Act 2023 (Section 15(b)) (Commencement) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited social welfare (miscellaneous provisions) act 2023 (section 15(b)) (commencement) order 2024

title: of the Social Welfare (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2023 (No. 37 of 2023)
heading: 2. The 17th day of June 2024 is appointed as the day on which section 15(b)
text_raw:
2. The 17th day of June 2024 is appointed as the day on which section 15(b) 
of the Social Welfare (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2023 (No. 37 of 2023) 
shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

7 June, 2024. 

HEATHER HUMPHREYS, 

Minister for Social Protection. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 11th June, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [277] 3

title: of the Social Welfare (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2023 (No. 37 of 2023)
heading: (This note is not a part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not a part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation). 

This Order provides for the commencement of section 15(b) of the Social 
Welfare (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2023. 

Section 15(b) amends the regulation making powers in the provisions that 
underpin the Credit Union Personal Micro Credit Loan Scheme, known as ‘It 
Makes Sense’, to bring the interest rate into alignment with the maximum 
interest rate specified by order of the Minister for Finance under section 38 of 
the Credit Union Act 1997. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [277]
